alert.note: Alert for Coahoma (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Phillips and west central Coahoma Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White River National Wildlife Refuge, Crumrod, Mellwood, Rena Lara, Mosby Spur, Ferguson, Catron, Green Grove, Lundell and Hillhouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
